The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/Users/chiragtankwal/projects/GST_BILLIN.serviceRawFile:
service: gst-billing-backend

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs20.x
  region: eu-north-1
  stage: dev
  environment:
    USERS_TABLE: GST_USERS
    BUSINESSES_TABLE: GST_BUSINESSES
    JWT_SECRET: ${env:JWT_SECRET, 'dev-secret-key-change-in-prod'}
    ADMIN_SECRET_KEY: ${env:ADMIN_SECRET_KEY, 'dev-admin-secret-key'}
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - dynamodb:Query
            - dynamodb:Scan
            - dynamodb:GetItem
            - dynamodb:PutItem
            - dynamodb:UpdateItem
            - dynamodb:DeleteItem
          Resource:
            - Fn::GetAtt: [UsersTable, Arn]
            - Fn::Join: [ '/', [ Fn::GetAtt: [UsersTable, Arn], 'index', 'EmailIndex' ] ]
            - Fn::Join: [ '/', [ Fn::GetAtt: [UsersTable, Arn], 'index', 'ApprovalStatusIndex' ] ]
            - Fn::GetAtt: [BusinessesTable, Arn]
            - Fn::Join: [ '/', [ Fn::GetAtt: [BusinessesTable, Arn], 'index', 'ApprovalStatusIndex' ] ]

functions:
  api:
    handler: src/app.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: /
          method: ANY
      - http:
          path: /{proxy+}
          method: ANY

resources:
  Resources:
    # 1. Users Table (GST_USERS) - The only active table for Phase 1
    UsersTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.USERS_TABLE}
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: userId
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: email
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: approvalStatus
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: userId
            KeyType: HASH
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: EmailIndex
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: email
                KeyType: HASH
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
          - IndexName: ApprovalStatusIndex
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: approvalStatus
                KeyType: HASH
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST

    # 2. Businesses Table
    BusinessesTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.BUSINESSES_TABLE}
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: userId
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: businessId
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: approvalStatus
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: userId
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: businessId
            KeyType: RANGE
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: ApprovalStatusIndex
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: approvalStatus
                KeyType: HASH
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST

plugins:
  - serverless-offline
